    • Constructor Detail

      • Tile

        public Tile(javax.swing.JFrame frame,
            java.awt.Graphics2D g2d,
            java.lang.String name,
            SpriteSheet sheet,
            int spriteNumber)
        Default constructor The purpose of multiple constructors is to cut down on possible parameters for special properties the tile may have.
        Parameters:
        frame - - JFrame the tile will be displayed on (The window)
        g2d - - Graphics2D object which displays graphics to a JFrame
        name - - String name of a tile which is strictly a user identifier, not used in logic
        sheet - - The spriteSheet object which the tile graphic can be found on
        spriteNumber - - The number in the spriteSheet that the graphic can be found on
